SELECT APPLY_NO, CASE WHEN APPLY_ST = 'A' THEN '지원완료' WHEN APPLY_ST = 'B' THEN '심사중' WHEN APPLY_ST = 'C' THEN '불합격' ELSE '합격' END AS APPLY_ST_NAME , TEAM_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(ENTITY_STATUS, 'NAME') AS ENTITY_STATUS_NAME, ESTABLISHED, FN_CODE_NM(HQ_LOCATION, 'NAME') AS HQ_LOCATION_NAME, REPRESENTATIVE, FN_CODE_NM(INDUSTRY, 'NAME') AS INDUSTRY_NAME, BUSINESS_ITEM, WEBSITE, SOCIAL_MEDIA_LINK, PROMO_VIDEO_LINK, FN_CODE_NM(SURVEY, 'NAME') AS SURVEY_NAME, CONVERT_TZ(CREATED_AT, 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul') AS CREATED_AT, CREATED_NO, (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_TP = 'I' AND FILE_FROM_NO = A.APPLY_NO AND DELETED_FG = 'N') AS IR_FILE_NAME, (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_TP = 'F' AND FILE_FROM_NO = A.APPLY_NO AND DELETED_FG = 'N') AS FORM_FILE_NAME FROM T_APPLY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELETED_FG = 'N'
AND (TEAM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR BUSINESS_ITEM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY A.CREATED_AT DESC
